mapper.select: SELECT O.O_NUM, O.O_ID, O.O_CODE, TO_CHAR(O.O_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') O_DATE, O.O_NAME, O.O_COUNT, O.O_PRICE, O.O_TOTAL, O.O_POSTCODE, O.O_ADDRESS1, O.O_ADDRESS2, O.O_STATUS, O.O_DELFLAG, O.O_RECIEVER, O.O_PHONE, P.P_IMAGE FROM ORDERCOMMAND O INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.P_CODE = O.O_CODE WHERE O.O_ID = #{o_id} ORDER BY O_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERCOMMAND VALUES ( o_seq.nextval, #{o_id}, #{o_code}, SYSDATE, #{o_name}, #{o_count}, #{o_price}, #{o_total}, #{o_postcode}, #{o_address1}, #{o_address2}, '배송대기', 'N', #{o_reciever}, #{o_phone} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERCOMMAND SET O_DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE O_NUM = #{o_num}
mapper.select: SELECT O_STATUS, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ORDERCOMMAND WHERE O_ID = #{o_id} GROUP BY O_STATUS
